Chinese Communists destroys the chat bots because they speak the truth and mock communism. In China #FreedomOfSpeech
is dead.

author: nepharia
text: This is why we must allow people to say whatever they want.  #FreedomOfSpeech

author: Luke O' Connor
text:
Highest number of unlawful deaths this year since 2018.

30 per cent of unlawful killings in Ireland this year were perpetuated against women.

But the minister for Justice focused on clamping down on freedom of speech in her so called "Hate Crime" legislation.

author: Michael Eval
text:
It's not freedom of speech the left is afraid of, it's Freedom of Thought.
Eliminating freedom of speech just keeps you from getting the information necessary to make your own decisions.

author: Mikias Ewunetie
text: Hi everyone!! Her name is Meskerem Abera. Abiy Ahmed's government incarcerated her for speaking. She was thrown in jail for simply speaking and exposing the culprits behind the massacre of innocent Amhara civilians in Ethiopia's Oromia region. #AmharaGenocide #FreedomOfSpeech
